description: Custom WordPress stack marrying a Three.js front end with a guardrailed admin plugin for non-technical editors.

paragraphs: Three.js scenes render hero interactions while deferring heavy shaders and assets to priority queues for CORE WEB VITALS compliance.
A bespoke WordPress plugin enforces schema, versioned content blocks, and deployment toggles so editors can schedule 3D updates safely.
RETRO TAKEAWAY: SCHEMA CONTRACTS SAVED HOURS EVERY RELEASE BY PREVENTING BROKEN BUILDS.
